column4: i'm desperate, please tell me if there is another way to access via mouse or script the CTRL-ALT-F1-6 command for the console... my laptop keyboard has a bug and freezes in X
I don't even know what that shortcut does
it get's you in the console mode
duhh! Of course. Sorry, I didn't think well. Ask for another shortcut to access the tty. Sorry but I don't know of others
